verses.verse: Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"On the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> of the first<WH259> month<WH2320> you shall set<WH6965> up the tabernacle<WH4908> of the tent<WH168> of meeting.<WH4150>
"And you shall place<WH7760> the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715> there,<WH8033> and you shall screen<WH5526> the ark<WH727> with the veil.<WH6532>
"And you shall bring<WH935> in the table<WH7979> and arrange<WH6186> what<WH6187> belongs<WH6187> on it; and you shall bring<WH935> in the lampstand<WH4501> and mount<WH5927> its lamps.<WH5216>

"Moreover, you shall set<WH5414> the gold<WH2091> altar<WH4196> of incense<WH7004> before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of the testimony,<WH5715> and set<WH7760> up the veil<WH4539> for the doorway<WH6607> to the tabernacle.<WH4908>
"And you shall set<WH5414> the altar<WH4196> of burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> in front<WH6440> of the doorway<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the tent<WH168> of meeting.<WH4150>
"And you shall set<WH5414> the laver<WH3595> between<WH996> the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> and the altar,<WH4196> and put<WH5414> water<WH4325> in it.
"And you shall set<WH7760> up the court<WH2691> all<WH5439> around<WH5439> and hang<WH5414> up the veil<WH4539> for the gateway<WH8179> of the court.<WH2691>

"Then you shall take<WH3947> the anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081> and anoint<WH4886> the tabernacle<WH4908> and all<WH3605> that is in it, and shall consecrate<WH6942> it and all<WH3605> its furnishings;<WH3627> and it shall be holy.<WH6944>

"And you shall anoint<WH4886> the altar<WH4196> of burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> and all<WH3605> its utensils,<WH3627> and consecrate<WH6942> the altar;<WH4196> and the altar<WH4196> shall be most<WH6944> holy.<WH6944>
"And you shall anoint<WH4886> the laver<WH3595> and its stand,<WH3653> and consecrate<WH6942> it.
"Then you shall bring<WH7126> Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> to the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> and wash<WH7364> them with water.<WH4325>
"And you shall put<WH3847> the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899> on Aaron<WH175> and anoint<WH4886> him and consecrate<WH6942> him, that he may minister<WH3547> as a priest<WH3547> to Me.
"And you shall bring<WH7126> his sons<WH1121> and put<WH3847> tunics<WH3801> on them;

and you shall anoint<WH4886> them even<WH9201> as you have anointed<WH4886> their father, that they may minister<WH1> as priests<WH3547> to Me; and their anointing<WH3547> shall qualify<WH4888> them for a perpetual<WH1961> priesthood<WH5769> throughout their generations.<WH3550> "
Thus Moses<WH4872> did;<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> that the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> him, so<WH3651> he did.<WH6213>
Now it came<WH1961> about in the first<WH7223> month<WH2320> of the second<WH8145> year,<WH8141> on the first<WH259> day of the month,<WH2320> that the tabernacle<WH4908> was erected.<WH6965>

And Moses<WH4872> erected<WH6965> the tabernacle<WH4908> and laid<WH5414> its sockets,<WH134> and set<WH7760> up its boards,<WH7175> and inserted<WH5414> its bars<WH1280> and erected<WH6965> its pillars.<WH5982>

And he spread<WH6566> the tent<WH168> over<WH5921> the tabernacle<WH4908> and put<WH7760> the covering<WH4372> of the tent<WH168> on top<WH4605> of it, just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

Then he took<WH3947> the testimony<WH5715> and put<WH5414> [it] into the ark,<WH727> and attached<WH7760> the poles<WH905> to the ark,<WH727> and put<WH5414> the mercy<WH3727> seat<WH3727> on top<WH4605> of the ark.<WH727>

And he brought<WH935> the ark<WH727> into the tabernacle,<WH4908> and set<WH7760> up a veil<WH6532> for the screen,<WH4539> and screened<WH5526> off<WH5526> the ark<WH727> of the testimony,<WH5715> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
Then he put<WH5414> the table<WH7979> in the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> on the north<WH6828> side<WH3409> of the tabernacle,<WH4908> outside<WH4480> <WH2351> the veil.<WH6532>
And he set<WH6186> the arrangement<WH6187> of bread<WH3899> in order<WH6186> on it before<WH6440> the Lord,<WH3068> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
Then he placed<WH7760> the lampstand<WH4501> in the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> opposite<WH5227> the table,<WH7979> on the south<WH5045> side<WH3409> of the tabernacle.<WH4908>
And he lighted<WH5927> the lamps<WH5216> before<WH6440> the Lord,<WH3068> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
Then he placed<WH7760> the gold<WH2091> altar<WH4196> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> in front<WH6440> of the veil;<WH6532>
and he burned<WH6999> fragrant<WH5561> incense<WH7004> on it, just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
Then he set<WH7760> up the veil<WH4539> for the doorway<WH6607> of the tabernacle.<WH4908>

And he set<WH7760> the altar<WH4196> of burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> [before] the doorway<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> and offered<WH5927> on it the burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> and the meal<WH4503> offering,<WH4503> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
And he placed<WH7760> the laver<WH3595> between<WH996> the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> and the altar,<WH4196> and put<WH5414> water<WH4325> in it for washing.<WH7364>
And from it Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> washed<WH7364> their hands<WH3027> and their feet.<WH7272>

When they entered<WH935> the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> and when they approached<WH7126> the altar,<WH4196> they washed,<WH7364> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And he erected<WH6965> the court<WH2691> all<WH5439> around<WH5439> the tabernacle<WH4908> and the altar,<WH4196> and hung<WH5414> up the veil<WH4539> for the gateway<WH8179> of the court.<WH2691> Thus Moses<WH4872> finished<WH3615> the work.<WH4399>
Then the cloud<WH6051> covered<WH3680> the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> and the glory<WH9202> of the Lord<WH3068> filled<WH4390> the tabernacle.<WH4908>

And Moses<WH4872> was not able<WH3201> to enter<WH935> the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> because<WH3588> the cloud<WH6051> had settled<WH7931> on it, and the glory<WH9202> of the Lord<WH3068> filled<WH4390> the tabernacle.<WH4908>
And throughout all<WH3605> their journeys<WH4550> whenever the cloud<WH6051> was taken<WH5927> up from over<WH5921> the tabernacle,<WH4908> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> would set<WH5265> out;
but if<WH518> the cloud<WH6051> was not taken<WH5927> up, then they did not set<WH5265> out until<WH5704> the day<WH3117> when it was taken<WH5927> up.

For throughout all<WH3605> their journeys,<WH4550> the cloud<WH6051> of the Lord<WH3068> was on the tabernacle<WH4908> by day,<WH3119> and there was fire<WH784> in it by night,<WH3915> in the sight<WH5869> of all<WH3605> the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478>
